long_description: Keep your Katadyn Drip Gravidyn gravity water filter (sold separately) working properly and producing great-tasting water with this replacement element. Microporous, silver-incorporated ceramic element filters out particles and harmful bacteria and parasites such as giardia and cryptosporidia. Activated carbon removes unpleasant tastes and odors such as chlorine. Replace the Katadyn Drip Gravidyn filter element according to the measuring gauge, or every 6 mos., whichever is sooner.
short_description: Keep your Katadyn Drip Gravidyn gravity water filter (sold separately) working properly and producing great-tasting water with this replacement element.
